title: Packers beat Bears in ugly opener, Week 1 Picks Against the Spread (Football 9/6)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by the Pick Six SuperFriends to break down all angles of the kickoff to the NFL's 100th season as Green Bay topped Chicago in an ugly affair. The guys analyze Mitch Trubisky's struggles, Aaron Rodgers' in Matt LaFleur's system and overreactions we might make after one game. Then, Will is joined by Pete Prisco and RJ White to discuss gambling on Week 1 and pick games against the spread. 
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
